segment.source: With Windows 10, you can create provisioning packages that let you quickly and efficiently configure a device without having to install a new image.
segment.target: With Windows 10, you can create provisioning packages that let you quickly and efficiently configure a device without having to install a new image.

segment.source: With Windows 10, you can create provisioning packages that let you quickly and efficiently configure a device without having to install a new image.
segment.target: With Windows 10, you can create provisioning packages that let you quickly and efficiently configure a device without having to install a new image.

segment.source: Provisioning packages are simple enough that with a short set of written instructions, a student or non-technical employee can use them to configure their device.
segment.target: Provisioning packages are simple enough that with a short set of written instructions, a student or non-technical employee can use them to configure their device.

segment.source: This can result in a significant reduction in the time required to configure multiple devices in your organization.
segment.target: This can result in a significant reduction in the time required to configure multiple devices in your organization.

segment.source: Quickly configure a new device without going through the process of installing a new image.
segment.target: Quickly configure a new device without going through the process of installing a new image.

segment.source: Save time by configuring multiple devices using one provisioning package.
segment.target: Save time by configuring multiple devices using one provisioning package.

segment.source: Quickly configure employee-owned devices in an organization without a mobile device management (MDM) infrastructure.
segment.target: Quickly configure employee-owned devices in an organization without a mobile device management (MDM) infrastructure.

segment.source: Set up a device without the device having network connectivity.
segment.target: Set up a device without the device having network connectivity.

segment.source: Installed using removable media such as an SD card or USB flash drive.
segment.target: Installed using removable media such as an SD card or USB flash drive.

segment.source: The following table provides some examples of what can be configured using provisioning packages.
segment.target: The following table provides some examples of what can be configured using provisioning packages.

segment.source: Automatic enrollment into Microsoft Intune or a third-party MDM service
segment.target: Automatic enrollment into Microsoft Intune or a third-party MDM service

segment.source: Security restrictions (password, device lock, camera, and so on), encryption, update settings
segment.target: Security restrictions (password, device lock, camera, and so on), encryption, update settings

segment.source: Home and lock screen wallpaper, computer name, domain join, DNS settings, and so on
segment.target: Home and lock screen wallpaper, computer name, domain join, DNS settings, and so on

segment.source: For details about the settings you can customize in provisioning packages, see Windows Provisioning settings reference.
segment.target: For details about the settings you can customize in provisioning packages, see Windows Provisioning settings reference.

segment.source: With Windows 10, you can use the Windows Imaging and Configuration Designer (ICD) tool to create provisioning packages.
segment.target: With Windows 10, you can use the Windows Imaging and Configuration Designer (ICD) tool to create provisioning packages.

segment.source: To install Windows ICD and create provisioning packages, you must install the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) for Windows 10from the Windows Insider Program site.
segment.target: To install Windows ICD and create provisioning packages, you must install the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) for Windows 10from the Windows Insider Program site.

segment.source: While running ADKsetup.exe, select the following features from the Select the features you want to install dialog box:
segment.target: While running ADKsetup.exe, select the following features from the Select the features you want to install dialog box:

segment.source: Windows ICD depends on other tools in order to work correctly.
segment.target: Windows ICD depends on other tools in order to work correctly.

segment.source: If you only select Windows ICD in the installation wizard, the other tools listed above will also be selected for installation.
segment.target: If you only select Windows ICD in the installation wizard, the other tools listed above will also be selected for installation.

segment.source: Once you have installed Windows ICD, you can use it to create a provisioning package.
segment.target: Once you have installed Windows ICD, you can use it to create a provisioning package.

segment.source: For detailed instructions on how to create a provisioning package, see Build and apply a provisioning package.
segment.target: For detailed instructions on how to create a provisioning package, see Build and apply a provisioning package.

segment.source: Applying a provisioning package to a device
segment.target: Applying a provisioning package to a device

segment.source: Provisioning packages can be applied both during image deployment and during runtime.
segment.target: Provisioning packages can be applied both during image deployment and during runtime.

segment.source: For information on how to apply a provisioning package to a Windows 10-based device, see Build and apply a provisioning package.
segment.target: For information on how to apply a provisioning package to a Windows 10-based device, see Build and apply a provisioning package.

segment.source: Update Windows 10 images with provisioning packages
segment.target: Update Windows 10 images with provisioning packages
